author: cbrzn
content: Quick question: In EIP-2938 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-2938.md#nonce-0x48-opcode) it says that `NONCE` opcode should be added at slot `0x48` but it looks like (https://ethervm.io/#48) it has already been taken by `BASEFEE` from EIP-3198 (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-3198.md#specification). Is this a mistake or I am understanding things wrong?
